revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Cisco |model=RV042 |revision=G-NA |asin=B0002I7288,B008CWW6VY |manuf= |availability= |type=VPN Router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=IXP425B;FWIXP425BB; |cpu1_cspeed=266 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Numonyx |fla1_model=JS28F640J3D75 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V281620ETP-H |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |serial=yes |jtag=yes |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Infineon |sw_model=ADM6999 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=2 |flags= |tp_firmware= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Cisco RV042 Dual WAN VPN Router}} :[http://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/routers/rv042-dual-wan-vpn-router/index.html Product page]
"A5LS-RV4200-30" and "A5NB-E05000-30" is silkscreeened on the board. :The [[Intel XScale]] processor is part FWIXP425BB.
===Links=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Linksys_RV042 On the '''DD-WRT''' wiki] *[http://www.cs.rit.edu/~ats/os1-2006-1/p/black-blumenfeld.pdf ''Linux on the RV042''] *[http://www.badcaps.net/forum/showthread.php?t=10485 ''Failing RV042 routers'' on '''badcaps.net''' forums] (internal images) :This device is presumed to be the original revision.
